content.text: Mr. ROHRABACHER. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. ROHRABACHER

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 8 o'clock and 12 minutes 
p.m.), the House adjourned until tomorrow, Friday, November 3, 2017, at 
9 a.m.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
